description:
'networks' quota can be available based on config value. api-ref should show that for quota-set and quota-class APIs and also sample files so that it can be tested somewhere.

As those are deprecated with 2.35 in quota-set APIs (not in quota class), its good to have such info in api doc.
title: 'networks' quota info missing in quota api-ref

comments.content:
'networks' quota can be available based on config value. api-ref should show that for quota-set and quota-class APIs and also sample files so that it can be tested somewhere.

As those are deprecated with 2.35 in quota-set APIs (not in quota class), its good to have such info in api doc.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content:
> As those are deprecated with 2.35

They were actually deprecated in 2.36.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/479227
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=e332797e4222012212ffd880a9ea5b94fa3e3446

Branch:    master

commit e332797e4222012212ffd880a9ea5b94fa3e3446
Author: ghanshyam <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 30 12:31:29 2017 +0300

    Add 'networks' quota in quota sample files
    
    'networks' quota can be available based on config value.
    api-ref should show that for quota-set APIs and also sample files
    so that it can be tested somewhere.
    
    Also adding it to quota class APIs sample files also.
    Closes-Bug: #1702201
    
    Change-Id: I84d562a8ca10826dea4675d74669b5de64ff0ed0
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
